description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(327).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,434,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[327], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[-(x^3 - 18 x^2 - 217 x - 18)/(x^4 - 434 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 05 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[18,217,7830,94177]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 434*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
